tool_description: API framework to query the MITRE ATT&CK framework which is a global dataset of adversarial tactics, techniques, and tools to understand cyber kill chains.
name: MITRE ATT&CK Framework
title: MITRE ATT&CK Framework

api_list.name: List - Techniques
api_list.description: Get an entire list of all MITRE ATT&CK techniques. Returns an array with each technique ID, name, and tactics associated with it.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mitre-att-ck-framework.p.rapidapi.com/attack/list/techniques"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mitre-att-ck-framework.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mitre-att-ck-framework.p.rapidapi.com/attack/list/techniques"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mitre-att-ck-framework.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: techniques
api_list.description: Get adversarial techniques based on the unique MITRE tcode (ex. T1566.001). Also retrieves and cross references mitigation and detection information unique to this attack technique.

optional_parameters.name: verb
optional_parameters.description:
verb: verbosity [0-3]

Determines how much data you want returned. Default is 0, but can go up to 3 for full data field retrieval.

optional_parameters.name: m
optional_parameters.description:
m : mitigations [true,false]

Return mitigation data with attack technique.

optional_parameters.name: d
optional_parameters.description:
d : detection [true,false]

Return detection data for this specific attack technique.
